subject: Cross-Country Skiing
Nordic Combined (Winter Sport Event)
Skiing
Freestyle Skiing
Cross-Country Skiing
lead_paragraph: Marit Bjorgen led a Norwegian sweep of the podium in the first stage of the women’s cross-country Tour de Ski in Oberstdorf, Germany, while Dario Cologna won the men’s race.
snippet: Marit Bjorgen led a Norwegian sweep of the podium in the first stage of the women’s cross-country Tour de Ski in Oberstdorf, Germany, while Dario Cologna won the men’s race.
